welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jayaque, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport, used for freight and logistics purposes.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Salvador International Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at El Salvador International Airport is responsible for all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
